http:
  routers:
    nextcloud-router-http:
      rule: Host(`nextcloud.bourne.cloud`)
      service: nextcloud-service
    nextcloud-router-https:
      rule: Host(`nextcloud.bourne.cloud`)
      service: nextcloud-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    nextcloud-service:
      loadBalancer:
        serversTransport: insecureTransport
        servers:
          - url: "http://192.168.1.11"
  serversTransports:
    insecureTransport:
      insecureSkipVerify: true
